posting.title: Posting Operations
posting.subtitle: Manage accounting period-end posting and closing procedures
posting.noPermission: You don't have permission to access posting functionality.
posting.sequenceNote: Posting operations should be performed in sequence: Buku Besar â†’ Neraca Detail â†’ Neraca Balance â†’ Neraca Akhir
posting.verifyNote: Always verify calculations before posting final balance sheets
posting.unpostingNote: Unposting operations reverse the effects of posting - use with caution
posting.completenessNote: Ensure all ledger entries are complete before beginning posting procedures

bukuBesarPosting.title: Buku Besar Posting
bukuBesarPosting.subtitle: Post general ledger entries for a specific date
bukuBesarPosting.description: Post all pending ledger entries to the general ledger for the specified date
bukuBesarPosting.explanation: Buku Besar (General Ledger) posting transfers all pending ledger entries to the posted status, making them part of the official accounting records.
bukuBesarPosting.step1: All PENDING ledger entries for the date are marked as POSTED
bukuBesarPosting.step2: Account balances are updated with the posted amounts
bukuBesarPosting.step3: The posting timestamp is recorded for audit purposes
bukuBesarPosting.step4: Posted entries become immutable and part of the official record
bukuBesarPosting.unpostExplanation: Unposting reverses the posting operation and returns entries to PENDING status. Use this only when corrections are needed before month-end closing.
bukuBesarPosting.warning: Always ensure all ledger entries are correct before posting. Unposting should be done carefully as it affects financial reporting.

neracaDetailPosting.title: Neraca Detail Posting
neracaDetailPosting.subtitle: Post detailed balance sheet information
neracaDetailPosting.description: Post detailed balance sheet with account-level breakdowns
neracaDetailPosting.explanation: Neraca Detail posting creates a detailed balance sheet that shows account-level breakdowns for assets, liabilities, and equity accounts.
neracaDetailPosting.step1: Detailed account balances are calculated and recorded
neracaDetailPosting.step2: Sub-account totals are aggregated to parent accounts
neracaDetailPosting.step3: Balance sheet structure is validated for completeness
neracaDetailPosting.step4: Detailed balance report becomes available for review
neracaDetailPosting.prereq1: Buku Besar must be posted for the same date
neracaDetailPosting.prereq2: All account detail entries should be complete
neracaDetailPosting.prereq3: Account hierarchies should be properly structured
neracaDetailPosting.unpostExplanation: Unposting removes the detailed balance sheet and returns accounts to their pre-posting state. Use this if account structures need adjustment.
neracaDetailPosting.orderNote: This should be performed after Buku Besar posting and before Neraca Balance posting for proper sequence.

neracaBalancePosting.title: Neraca Balance Posting
neracaBalancePosting.subtitle: Calculate and post balance sheet with retained earnings (SHU)
neracaBalancePosting.description: Post balance sheet with auto-calculated Sisa Hasil Usaha (SHU) amount
neracaBalancePosting.autoCalculated: Amount automatically set from balance calculation:
neracaBalancePosting.calculateFirst: Please calculate the balance first to auto-populate this field.
neracaBalancePosting.reminderText: Ensure you have calculated and verified the balance before posting. The SHU amount will be automatically set from your calculation results.

neracaAkhirPosting.title: Neraca Akhir Posting
neracaAkhirPosting.subtitle: Post final balance sheet for period-end closing
neracaAkhirPosting.description: Finalize the balance sheet for accounting period closure
neracaAkhirPosting.finalWarning: This is the final step in the posting sequence. Once completed, the accounting period will be considered closed and locked.
neracaAkhirPosting.explanation: Neraca Akhir (Final Balance Sheet) posting is the last step in the accounting period closure process. It creates the official final balance sheet that will be used for financial reporting.
neracaAkhirPosting.step1: Final balance sheet is generated and locked
neracaAkhirPosting.step2: All account balances are finalized for the period
neracaAkhirPosting.step4: Period closure is marked as complete
neracaAkhirPosting.step5: Audit trail is finalized for compliance
neracaAkhirPosting.afterNote: Once Neraca Akhir is posted, the accounting period is considered closed. Any subsequent adjustments will require special procedures and approvals.
neracaAkhirPosting.closureNote: Ensure all previous posting steps are completed and verified before proceeding with this final posting operation.
neracaAkhirPosting.practiceNote: Backup your database before performing final posting to ensure data recovery capability if needed.

bukuBesar.description: Post general ledger entries for a specific date

neracaBalance.description: Post balance sheet with retained earnings (SHU)

neracaAkhir.description: Post final balance sheet for period-end closing
